string-array.name: alarm_method_titles_array
string-array.item: Show a popup window with an option to snoose the alarm
Show a notification at the status bar

string-array.name: reminder_behavior_for_completed_task_titles_array
string-array.item: Do not schedule reminders for completed task

string-array.name: start_time_required_action_titles_array
string-array.item: Apply default start time from settings
Do not apply start time automatically

string-array.name: sync_policy_titles_array
string-array.item: Always sync local data with server data
Don’t sync local data with server data

string-array.name: mark_sync_needed_titles_array
string-array.item: Always mark data need to be synchronized
Mark data need to be synchronized only if synchronization is switched on
Never mark data need to be synchronized

string-array.name: business_hours_task_displaying_policy_titles_array
string-array.item: Display tasks as usual, within business hours area

string-array.name: hours_ruler_displaying_policy_titles_array
string-array.item: Display separate hours ruler for each day
